verses.verse: Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> and <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for the <S%H6544>avenging<s%> <S%H6546><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5068>willingly<s%> offered themselves.

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O you <S%H4428>kings;<s%> give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O you <S%H7336>princes;<s%> I, even I, will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when you <S%H3318>went<s%> out of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> when you <S%H6805>marched<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5197>dropped,<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>melted<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even that <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael,<s%> the <S%H734>highways<s%> were <S%H2308>unoccupied,<s%> and the <S%H1980>travelers<s%> <S%H5410><s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H734>byways.<s%> <S%H6128><s%>

The inhabitants of the <S%H6520>villages<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> they <S%H2308>ceased<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> that I <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> that I <S%H6965>arose<s%> a <S%H517>mother<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> was <S%H3901>war<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates:<s%> was there a <S%H4043>shield<s%> or <S%H7420>spear<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> among <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is toward the <S%H2710>governors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that offered themselves <S%H5068>willingly<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H7878>Speak,<s%> you that <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6715>white<s%> <S%H860>asses,<s%> you that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H4055>judgment,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

They that are delivered from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H2686>archers<s%> in the places of <S%H4857>drawing<s%> water, there shall they <S%H8567>rehearse<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> acts of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> acts toward the inhabitants of his <S%H6520>villages<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> then shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah:<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1696>utter<s%> a <S%H7892>song:<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> and lead your <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H7617>captive,<s%> you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> he made him that <S%H8300>remains<s%> have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H117>nobles<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made me have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

Out of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was there a <S%H8328>root<s%> of them against <S%H6002>Amalek;<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> among your <S%H5971>people;<s%> out of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2710>governors,<s%> and out of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> they that <S%H4900>handle<s%> the <S%H7626>pen<s%> of the <S%H5608>writer.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> were with <S%H1683>Deborah;<s%> even <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H3651>also<s%> <S%H1301>Barak:<s%> he was <S%H7971>sent<s%> on <S%H7272>foot<s%> into the <S%H6010>valley.<s%> For the <S%H6391>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> there were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2711>thoughts<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> you <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8292>bleatings<s%> of the <S%H5739>flocks?<s%> For the <S%H6391>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> there were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2714>searchings<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H7931>stayed<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> did <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H1481>remain<s%> in <S%H591>ships?<s%> <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H3427>continued<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>shore,<s%> and <S%H7931>stayed<s%> in his <S%H4664>breaches.<s%>

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> were a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2778>risked<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%> to the <S%H4191>death<s%> in the <S%H4791>high<s%> places of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3898>fought,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo;<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1214>gain<s%> of <S%H3701>money.<s%>
They <S%H3898>fought<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> in their <S%H4546>courses<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera.<s%>

The <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> <S%H1640>swept<s%> them away, that <S%H6917>ancient<s%> <S%H5158>river,<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> you have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> down <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> were the horse <S%H6119>hoofs<s%> <S%H5483><s%> <S%H1986>broken<s%> by the means of the <S%H1726>prancings,<s%> the <S%H1726>prancings<s%> of their <S%H47>mighty<s%> ones.

<S%H779>Curse<s%> you <S%H4789>Meroz,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> you <S%H779>bitterly<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof; <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> not to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> above <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%> be, <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall she be above <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H168>tent.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2461>milk;<s%> she <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H7126>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> in a <S%H117>lordly<s%> <S%H5602>dish.<s%>

She <S%H7971>put<s%> her <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H3489>nail,<s%> and her <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> to the <S%H6001>workmen's<s%> <S%H1989>hammer;<s%> and with the hammer she <S%H1986>smote<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> she <S%H4277>smote<s%> off his <S%H7218>head,<s%> when she had <S%H4272>pierced<s%> and <S%H2498>stricken<s%> through his <S%H7541>temples.<s%>

<S%H996>At<s%> her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell,<s%> he <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down:<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell:<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H7703>dead.<s%>

The <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> out <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H2980>cried<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H822>lattice,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> is his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> so <S%H954>long<s%> in <S%H935>coming?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> <S%H309>tarry<s%> the <S%H6471>wheels<s%> of his <S%H4818>chariots?<s%>
Her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8282>ladies<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> her, <S%H637>yes,<s%> she <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H559>answer<s%> to herself,

Have they not <S%H4672>sped?<s%> have they not <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>prey;<s%> to <S%H7218>every<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> a <S%H7356>damsel<s%> or two; to <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> a <S%H7998>prey<s%> of <S%H6648>divers<s%> <S%H6648>colors,<s%> a <S%H7998>prey<s%> of <S%H6648>divers<s%> <S%H6648>colors<s%> of <S%H7553>needlework,<s%> of <S%H6648>divers<s%> <S%H6648>colors<s%> of <S%H7553>needlework<s%> on both sides, meet for the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them that take the <S%H7998>spoil?<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but let them that <S%H157>love<s%> him be as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> when he <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> in his <S%H1369>might.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
